meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which hair is braided close to the scalp in rows.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful cornbraid to the party.
meanings.sent2: The stylist created a neat cornbraid for the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The cornbraid looked like a neat pattern on her head.
meanings.sent4: Her cornbraid was like a row of tiny braided soldiers standing in line.
meanings.sent5: The cornbraid made her look like a warrior princess.

meanings.definition: To braid hair in a close-to-the-scalp style.
meanings.sent1: She decided to cornbraid her hair for the summer.
meanings.sent2: I cornbraid my hair when I want a sleek look.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cornbraid his dog's fur as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The river cornbraided its way through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's movements were as smooth as cornbraiding hair.
